verses.verse: Who is this who <S%H935>comes<s%> from <S%H123>Edom,<s%> with <S%H2556>dyed<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> from <S%H1224>Bozrah?<s%> this who is <S%H1921>glorious<s%> in his <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> <S%H6808>marching<s%> in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H3581>strength?<s%> "It is I who <S%H1696>speak<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H7227>mighty<s%> to <S%H3467>save.<s%>"
Why are you <S%H122>red<s%> in your <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> and your <S%H899>garments<s%> like him who <S%H1869>treads<s%> in the wine <S%H1660>vat?<s%>

"I have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> the <S%H6333>winepress<s%> <S%H5971>alone;<s%> and of the peoples there was <S%H376>no<s%> man with <S%H1869>me:<s%> yes, I trod them in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7429>trampled<s%> them in my <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> and their <S%H5332>lifeblood<s%> is <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> on my <S%H899>garments,<s%> and I have <S%H1351>stained<s%> all my <S%H4403>clothing.<s%>
For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> was in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and the <S%H8141>year<s%> of my <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> has <S%H935>come.<s%>

I <S%H5027>looked,<s%> and there was none to <S%H5826>help;<s%> and I <S%H8074>wondered<s%> that there was none to <S%H5564>uphold:<s%> therefore my own <S%H2220>arm<s%> brought <S%H3467>salvation<s%> to <S%H2534>me;<s%> and my wrath, it upheld <S%H5564>me.<s%>

I trod <S%H947>down<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and made them <S%H7937>drunk<s%> in my <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and I <S%H3381>poured<s%> out their <S%H5332>lifeblood<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the loving <S%H2617>kindnesses<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on <S%H7227>us,<s%> and the great <S%H2898>goodness<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which he has <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on them according to his <S%H7356>mercies,<s%> and according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his loving <S%H2617>kindnesses.<s%>
For he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5971>"Surely,<s%> they are my people, <S%H1121>children<s%> who will not deal <S%H8266>falsely:<s%>" so he was their <S%H3467>Savior.<s%>

In all their <S%H6869>affliction<s%> he was <S%H6862>afflicted,<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of his <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H160>them:<s%> in his love and in his <S%H2551>pity<s%> he <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H5190>them;<s%> and he bore <S%H5375>them,<s%> and carried them all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>

But they <S%H4784>rebelled,<s%> and <S%H6087>grieved<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit:<s%> therefore he was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to be their <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and he himself fought against <S%H3898>them.<s%>

Then he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5927>saying,<s%> Where is he who brought them up out of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of his <S%H6629>flock?<s%> where is he who <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> in their <S%H7130>midst?<s%>

who caused his <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> at the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses?<s%> who <S%H1234>divided<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>them,<s%> to make himself an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name?<s%>
who <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>depths,<s%> as a <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> so that they <S%H3782>didn't<s%> stumble?

As the <S%H929>livestock<s%> that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H1237>valley,<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> caused them to <S%H5117>rest;<s%> so you <S%H5090>led<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> yourself a <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H7200>Look<s%> <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> from the <S%H2073>habitation<s%> of your <S%H6944>holiness<s%> and of your <S%H8597>glory:<s%> where are your <S%H7068>zeal<s%> and your <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1995>acts?<s%> the yearning of your <S%H4578>heart<s%> and your compassion is restrained toward <S%H662>me.<s%>

<S%H3588>For<s%> you are our <S%H1>Father,<s%> though <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3808>doesn't<s%> know <S%H3478>us,<s%> and Israel does not <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> <S%H3068>us:<s%> you, Yahweh, are our <S%H1>Father;<s%> our <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> is your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

O <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> why do you make us to <S%H8582>err<s%> from your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7188>harden<s%> our <S%H3820>heart<s%> from your <S%H3374>fear?<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H7626>sake,<s%> the tribes of your <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
Your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it but a little <S%H4705>while:<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have trodden <S%H947>down<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>
We have become as they over whom you <S%H5769>never<s%> bear <S%H4910>rule,<s%> as those who were not <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
